original: ** ZE_CHRISTMAS_INFECTION **
zh_trans: ** ZE_CHRISTMAS_INFECTION - 圣诞夜惊魂 **

original: ** CURRENT LEVEL: EASY **
zh_trans: ** 当前等级：简单 **

original: ** TIP: You can pick up special items from the spinning presents randomly placed in the map. **
zh_trans: ** 提示：您可以从随机放置在地图中的旋转礼物盒中捡起神器。**

original: ** Red and blue presents will contain zombie and human items respectively. **
zh_trans: ** 红色和蓝色礼物盒将分别包含僵尸和人类的神器。**

original: *** The door opens in 30 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 门将在 30 秒后打开 ***

original: *** The door opens in 10 seconds. Hold! ***
zh_trans: *** 门将在 10 秒后打开。守住！***

original: *** The door opens in 5 seconds. RESIST!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 门将在 5 秒后打开。坚持！！！ ***

original: *** Hold the bridge! The door opens in 20 seconds! ***
zh_trans: *** 守住这座桥！门将在 20 秒后打开！***

original: *** Activate one of the control pannels! ***
zh_trans: *** 激活其中一个控制面板！***

original: ** Tree placer has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to place a tree. **
zh_trans: ** 已捡起 圣诞树。按 E 放置一棵圣诞树。**

original: ** Snowball launcher has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to launch a snowball. **
zh_trans: ** 雪球发射器已被拾取。按 E 发射雪球。**

original: ** Napalm candle has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to activate **
zh_trans: ** 凝固汽油弹蜡烛已被捡起。按 E 激活。 **

original: ** Well done! The door will open in 15 seconds! **
zh_trans: ** 干得好！门将在 15 秒后打开！**

original: *** HOLD! The elevator will leave in 25 seconds! ***
zh_trans: *** 坚持住！电梯将在 25 秒后离开！***

original: ** Zombie fog has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to activate **
zh_trans: ** 僵尸迷雾已被拾取。按下 E 来激活。**

original: *** FALL BACK! THE ELEVATOR LEAVES IN 5 SECONDS! ***
zh_trans: *** 撤退！电梯将在 5 秒后离开！***

original: ** Hold! The door will open in 25 seconds! **
zh_trans: ** 守住！门将在 25 秒后打开！**

original: ** Only 5 seconds left! RESIST! **
zh_trans: ** 只剩 5 秒了！抵抗住！**

original: ** We have to hold this area for 40 seconds until the doors open! **
zh_trans: ** 我们必须坚守这片区域 40 秒，直到门打开！**

original: ** Keep defending! 15 seconds left! **
zh_trans: ** 继续防守！还剩 15 秒！**

original: ** 5 seconds! RESIST!!! **
** Storage area door opening in 15 seconds. HOLD! **
zh_trans: ** 储物区的门将在 15 秒后开启。坚守住！**

original: ** Hold a bit! The door will open in 15 seconds! **
zh_trans: ** 再坚持一下！门将在 15 秒后打开！**

original: ** Hold 10 more seconds! The second doors will open soon!**
zh_trans: ** 再坚持 10 秒！第二扇门很快打开！**

original: ** THIS IS OUR LAST STAND! **
zh_trans: ** 背水一战！ **

original: ** DEFEND THE CHRISTMAS AIRBOAT FOR 50 SECONDS!!! **
zh_trans: ** 保卫圣诞飞船 50 秒！！！**

original: ** RESIST! 30 SECONDS LEFT!!! **
** 15 SECONDS! KEEP IT UP!!! **
** LAST 5 SECONDS! RESIST!!! **
zh_trans: ** 最后 5 秒！坚持住！！！**

original: ** You have beaten easy mode... Let's see now how you do in MEDIUM! **
zh_trans: ** 你已经通过了简单模式... 现在让我们看看你在中等模式中的表现如何！**

original: ** Ice boomerang has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to throw it. **
zh_trans: ** 冰回旋镖已被捡起。按 E 来投掷它。**

original: ** Zombie present placer has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to place a present. **
zh_trans: ** 礼物放置器已被拾取。按下 E 键放置一个礼物。**

original: ** Well done! The door opens in 20 seconds. RESIST!!! **
zh_trans: ** 干得好！门将在 20 秒后打开。坚持住！！！**

original: ** Icewall spawner has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to spawn a wall. **
zh_trans: ** 冰墙生成器已被拾取。按下 E 键生成一堵墙。**

original: *** ZOMBIES DETECTED ON BOAT - INVALID VICTORY!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 船上检测到僵尸 - 无效胜利！！！ ***

original: ** An evil christmas ogre has appeared... **
zh_trans: ** 一个邪恶的圣诞食人魔出现了... **

original: ** Magical lantern has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to activate it. **
zh_trans: ** 魔法灯笼已被捡起。按下 E 键来激活它。**

original: * Whirpool summoner has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to summon*
zh_trans: * 漩涡召唤器已被捡起。按 E 召唤。*

original: ** CURRENT LEVEL: MEDIUM **
zh_trans: ** 当前等级：中等 **

original: ** Zombie heal has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to activate.**
zh_trans: ** 僵尸治疗已被拾取。按下 E 来激活。**

original: * Trampoline placer has been picked up. Press +USE (E) to place a trampoline. *
zh_trans: * 蹦床放置器已被捡起。按 E 放置蹦床。*

original: ** We have to hold this area for 60 seconds until the doors open! **
zh_trans: ** 我们必须坚守这片区域 60 秒，直到门打开！**

original: ** Keep defending! 30 seconds left! **
zh_trans: ** 继续防守！还剩 30 秒！**

original: ** 15 seconds! RESIST!!! **
** LAST 5 SECONDS! GET READY!!! **
zh_trans: ** 最后 5 秒！做好准备！！！**

original: ** Hold! The door opens in 20 seconds!!! **
zh_trans: ** 守住！门将在 20 秒后打开！！！**

original: ** KEEP HOLDING! 5 MORE SECONDS!!! **
zh_trans: ** 保持火力！还有 5 秒！！！**

original: ** Hold a bit! The door will open in 20 seconds! **
zh_trans: ** 再坚持一下！门将在 20 秒后打开！**

original: ** DEFEND THE CHRISTMAS AIRBOAT! THE STAR OF THE NORTH IS FALLING! **
zh_trans: ** 保卫圣诞飞船！北极之星正在坠落！**

original: ** THE CORE OF THE AIRBOAT IS MISSING! WE HAVE TO FIND IT!!! **
zh_trans: ** 飞船的核心不见了！我们必须找到它！！！**

original: ** TIP: The core must be brought back to the back of the ship to leave. **
zh_trans: ** 提示：必须把核心带回船尾才能离开。**

original: ** THE STAR OF THE NORTH WILL WIPE EVERYTHING OUT IN 20 SECONDS! **
zh_trans: ** 北极之星将在 20 秒后摧毁一切！**

original: ** IT'S TOO LATE! THE BOAT WILL NOT DO IT IN TIME! WE WILL DIE! **
zh_trans: ** 太慢了！船来不及离开！我们要葬身于此了！**

original: ** The core has been found! Take it to the boat! **
zh_trans: ** 核心已经找到！把它带到船上去！**

original: *** Activate both control pannels at once to unlock the door! ***
zh_trans: *** 同时启动两个控制面板来解锁大门！***

original: ** The boat has energy again! We will be able to leave now!!! **
zh_trans: ** 飞船又有能量了！我们现在可以离开了！！！**

original: ** Resist for 15 seconds! **
** LAST 5 SECONDS! KEEP HOLDING!!! **
zh_trans: ** 最后 5 秒！坚持住！！！**

original: ** Well done! The things are now getting interesting at TOUGH mode!!! **
zh_trans: ** 干得好！困难模式下，事情将变得有趣起来了！！！**
